name: Green Man Racing: Petit Prix
description:
Ladies and Gentlemen, and Green Men! Rev up your engines for the Petit Prix!

Race on three epic stages! With powerups, oil slicks, and other opponents to try and stop you, get the fastest time and be the best racer in the Petit Prix! :O

Unlock new cars for reaching certain times, and get all of the cars! Each car has special attributes, so go get them all!Hope to see you on the race track, Green Man... B)

Controls:

W/S/Up Arrow/Down Arrow - Move up and down

D/Right Arrow/Space Bar - Accelerate

A /Left Arrow - Decelerate

R - Restart Race

ESC - Pause/Return to Main Menu
